name: jcc-factory
description: 剧柴柴 - 短剧本工坊 AI视频/小说解析平台
author: JCC Factory Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup:project: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && echo '请配置 server/.env 文件后运行 npm run setup:db 和 npm run setup:admin'
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules server\node_modules client\node_modules 2>nul || echo 清理完成
scripts.clean:build: rmdir /s /q client\dist server\dist 2>nul || echo 构建文件清理完成
scripts.audit:all: npm audit && cd server && npm audit && cd ../client && npm audit
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd server && npm update && cd ../client && npm update
